6 places, 1 WordCamp: WordCamp Jinja in Pictures 

		Posted on
		

					September 10, 2022				

					September 13, 2022				



		by
		

				Mukalele Rogers			





WordCamp Jinja 2022 was held on Friday 2nd and Saturday 3rd Sept 2022 with several sessions happening (1) at The Innovation Village [TIV] Jinja main hall, (2) at The Creative Tribe co-working space inside TIV, (3) in the TIV Training Room, (4) at Jinja City Hall, (5) at Jinja College School Computer Lab and finally (6) at the Source of The Nile. In total, over 200 participants attended the various sessions.
 Below are some of the captured moments.
The Innovation Village TIV, Jinja hall was the main venue where diverse speaker sessions were held.


















#Kudos to the partners, speakers and participants who made the inaugural #WordCampJinja a success. The engagements, trainings and hackathon were great and insightful. We strive to stay committed to providing platform where young people can meet, connect, and share ideas. pic.twitter.com/o75W402ID4— The Innovation Village (@TheVillageUG) September 5, 2022




#WordCampJinja breakfast was served, the event is on pic.twitter.com/zdj19waK50— WordPress Jinja Meetup (@WordPressJinja) September 2, 2022






Swag distribution at #WordCampJinja come grab yourself 1 pic.twitter.com/CxVqMTYibh— Moses Cursor (@CursorMoses) September 3, 2022




I must say this year's Wordcamp has been great. I met new developer  friends and unlearned old technologies. Thanks to the organisers and the sponsors but a big thank you to WORDPRESS.CODE IS POETRYThanks @mrogers4christ @Braindventure @CursorMoses @SteveUG @FrancisAkol3 pic.twitter.com/ioEXlLo0dc— Isleeve (@isleevedaniels) September 3, 2022



Jinja City Hall was the venue for the beginners track, which mainly targeted teachers and students.














High school students are also in attendance at #WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/BOYGyKiug0— WordPress Jinja Meetup (@WordPressJinja) September 2, 2022











#WordCampJinja 2022 is even more lit. Students through ICT Clubs showcasing achievements in #WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/cGFiz74dLI— Moses Cursor (@CursorMoses) September 2, 2022




It's always satisfying to see members of @ictteachersug converge to learn more in their field. Here again at #WordCampJinja too learn how to use #WordPress for @UNEB_UG exams.We are #RestlessTeachers pic.twitter.com/7XTboiFlYj— Stephen Dumba™ (@SteveUG) September 2, 2022



The Creative Tribe co-working space inside TIV hosted the Website Hackthon










#WordCampJinja the hackthorn team is at it's best designing #wordpress websites for free for those that showed interest @AfricanTechVC is leading the team. pic.twitter.com/1lvXiKY5s0— WordPress Jinja Meetup (@WordPressJinja) September 2, 2022




The Joy hidden in shock when you get a website in 24hrs.#WordCampJinja not your usual web developers. Thanks a bunch. pic.twitter.com/OoE2Msm6SW— Moses Cursor (@CursorMoses) September 3, 2022






5 sites developed in less that 24Hrs#WordCampJinja Making impact pic.twitter.com/PyZekLsYfJ— Moses Cursor (@CursorMoses) September 3, 2022




Jinja College School Computer Lab hosted the hands-on practice session for teachers and students








In the run up to #WordCampJinja conference, today we've setup @WordPress Web Authoring Software in lab @JinjaCollege and worked teachers through this earlier exam practice tutorial: https://t.co/R0Pl4Nolel We'll have another extra lab session here next week during the #WordCamp! pic.twitter.com/rDuGG4jjJJ— ICT Teachers Association of Uganda (ITAU) (@ictteachersug) August 24, 2022




Happening now: #WordCampJinja extra coding session @JinjaCollege Cc. @mrogers4christ @SteveUG @FrancisAkol3 @CursorMoses @NorahBetsy @davidofug @CerinahTrillion @imokolfaith @Braindventure @ pic.twitter.com/YCOaVyqsQC— WordPress Jinja Meetup (@WordPressJinja) September 2, 2022



The TIV Training Room hosted diverse speaker break away demo-sessions























Coding SESSION with CSS happening in the Training Room! Great attention here!#WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/pfwbxB59ZM— 💯Seleckta✨ Tosmic 🔥 (@selecktaTosmic) September 3, 2022




The graphics designing principles session#WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/T6ibit0Cyn— 💯Seleckta✨ Tosmic 🔥 (@selecktaTosmic) September 3, 2022



And finally, The Source of The Nile, Jinja hosted the After Party!

















Speeches aside! This has been my best WordCamp of all time thanks to the organizers @WordPressJinja , we visited the source of the longest river in the world River Nile, and I got to learn a few physics dynamics of the Nile @hussainb256 it was great catching up    #WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/A06yLnf1iQ— Kasirye Arthur (@Braindventure) September 4, 2022




#WordCampJinja took us to the source of the nile. 🔥🔥 @lailah_grant pic.twitter.com/q3V7JX85WR— Fanny Nyayic (@fanny_codes) September 4, 2022


Networking at the source of Nile after #WordCampJinja #wordcampjinja pic.twitter.com/qioFIOMTGX— ser-stuart (@Stuart_Ser) September 3, 2022






Our mighty cake at the source of the Nile…#WordCampJinja pic.twitter.com/GiIijiajLD— SADIK SEBI (@sadiksebi256) September 3, 2022




Just fun and edutainment at the #WordCampJinja more so when we had a walk to the source of the Nile. pic.twitter.com/nyJfxwaxVm— latif19 (@latif19131) September 3, 2022






#ExploreUganda #wordcampjinja #wordpress pic.twitter.com/CsNazLDpRX— Cerinah Kasirye (@CerinahTrillion) September 3, 2022





Special thanks to all the #WordCampJinja sponsors for making this possible. It's been such a boom and can't wait for next year's. #WordPress#WordCamp #WordPressKla pic.twitter.com/kQjMWdhI0M— Hamza @GoTechUG (@GoTechUG) September 2, 2022



Check out more photos in the drive at this link: bit.ly/wordcampjinjaphotos

			3 Replies to “6 places, 1 WordCamp: WordCamp Jinja in Pictures”		





 Stephen Dumba says: 

September 10, 2022 at 8:46 am 


It was a privilege to speak at #WordCampJinja. Many thanks to the @WordPressJinja community.







 Vicent says: 

September 10, 2022 at 9:23 am 


This was indeed cool
 I am happy I attended. For the presentation I made, find it here, miklahlife.com/wordcamp-jinja







 Mukalele Rogers says: 

September 13, 2022 at 8:35 am 


Huh! Got totally exhausted by the end of the WordCamp, being our first to organise here in Jinja and being a multi venue WordCamp catering for different needs of high school and university students, teachers, startup entrepreneurs, developers, designers and publishers! Still trying to recollect after several days of rest! It wasn’t easy, I am grateful to the almighty God and everyone for making this possible!
